transcription: I've been tryna find, searching for my peace of mind Going every night, I've been running every time Think I'm bout to go insane, think my mind gone in my head And I can't wait for the day, thinking bout it, nah I don't rest I've been tryna find, searching for my peace of mind Going every night, I've been running every time Think I'm bout to go insane, think my mind gone in my head And I can't wait for the day, thinking bout it, nah I don't rest  I  I'ma get to freaks Why the fuck you wasting time when you don't have to be? I've been trying to find, searching for my peace of mind Going every night, I've been running every time Think I'm bout to go insane, think my mind gone in my head And I can't wait for the day, thinking bout it now, I don't rest I've been trying to find, searching for my peace of mind Going every night, I've been running every time Think I'm bout to go insane, think my mind gone in my head And I can't wait for the day, thinking bout it now, I don't rest  Feel right, two pistols keep em real close Feel like I'm burning real slow My mind unrest, nigga being like this No time to stress, I'm blind at best To the world outside, I stay locked up No patience, I don't give a fuck Fuck everybody, fuck them I said them motherfuckers ain't shit Just leave em dead, I keep my distance And my vision is hatred I don't know why I ended up this way I'm losing patience, I'm losing faith In a human race, it's ruined Place eradicate this ravaged population  In the night, thoughts runnin' through my mind I've been tryna find, searchin' for my peace of mind Goin' every night, I've been runnin' every time Think I'm boutta go insane, think my mind got in my head And I can't wait for the day, thinkin' bout it, nah, I don't rest I've been tryna find, searchin' for my peace of mind Goin' every night, I've been runnin' every time Think I'm boutta go insane, think my mind got in my head And I can't wait for the day, thinkin' bout it, nah, I don't rest  you
